title: " Anemia'- Did you arrest Judy Mikovich without order and detain her without charges?
subtitle: The "Blandminki" film, which faces factual challenges, is a social media hit by groups such as anti-Vaxers and QANON conspiracy theories.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Judi Mikovic was arrested without a warrant and imprisoned without charges for a controversial scientific discovery.
